typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Country Name} as string,
		{Indicator Name} as string,
		{2002} as string,
		{2003} as string,
		{2004} as string,
		{2005} as string,
		{2006} as string,
		{2007} as string,
		{2008} as string,
		{2009} as string,
		{2010} as string,
		{2011} as string,
		{2012} as string,
		{2013} as string,
		{2014} as string,
		{2015} as string,
		{2016} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GDP
source(output(
		TableName as string,
		{Country Code} as string,
		Region as string,
		IncomeGroup as string,
		SpecialNotes as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
